entry.title: WIND WARNING , Maple Plains
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:41 AM AST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Maple Plains
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:39 AM AST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: 0.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Maple Plains 1:00 PM AST Friday 23 December 2022
Temperature: 0.6°C
Humidity: 77 %
Dewpoint: -3.0°C
Wind: E 20 km/h gust 45 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Rain mixed with snow. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Rain at times mixed with snow beginning this afternoon. Rainfall amount 5 mm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 this afternoon. High plus 3. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: Rain. Temperature rising to 10 by morning.
entry.summary: Rain. Risk of a thundershower overnight. Fog patches developing after midnight. Amount 10 to 15 mm. Wind east 50 km/h gusting to 70 becoming southeast 60 gusting to 90 this evening then southwest 20 gusting to 40 before morning. Temperature rising to 10 by morning. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 1 in the afternoon. POP 30%
entry.summary: Rain ending in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of rain showers later in the morning then 30 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 in the morning. Temperature falling to minus 1 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Friday 23 December 2022
